sentence: In total, 11 articles [23–33] were included in this study, as shown in Fig. 1.
In total, 11 articles [23–33] were included in this study, as shown in Fig. 1.

Pooled RR suggested that highest category of coffee consumption could reduce the risk of brain cancer (RR = 0.785, 95% CI = 0.580–0.984, I2 = 65.6%, P
for heterogeneity = 0.001) (Fig. 2), when compared with the lowest category.

Our meta-analysis result showed that there was a non-significant association between tea consumption and brain cancer risk (RR = 0.897, 95% CI = 0.739–1.088, I2 = 29.9%, P
for heterogeneity = 0.189) (Fig. 3).
Figure 4 showed that the RR was 0.684 (95% CI = 0.481–0.975) when compared the highest versus the lowest category consumption of coffee plus tea.
Figure 4 showed that the RR was 0.684 (95% CI = 0.481–0.975) when compared the highest versus the lowest category consumption of coffee plus tea.
